metadata.name: Extracting Information with PowerShell
metadata.comment: Adversaries may search local file systems and remote file shares for files containing insecurely stored credentials. These can be files created by users to store their own credentials, shared credential stores for a group of individuals, configuration files containing passwords for a system or service, or source code/binary files containing embedded passwords.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('ls')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower(' -r')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('select-string ')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('-pattern ')))
